text: Dušan Furlan (24 August 1929 - 9 June 2007) was a Slovenian gymnast. He competed in eight events at the 1952 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2007 deaths Category:Slovenian male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Yugoslavia Category:Gymnasts at the 1952 Summer Olympics
title: Dušan Furlan
